name: What Side are you On?
description:
A game for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme: "Roll of the Dice"

Jump through dice platforms, while rolling all the way down

Source Code:https://github.com/TrueNarwhak/What-Side-Are-You-On-

Links: https://linktr.ee/narwhak

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3rd party assets used:

Platformer Controller by heartbeast

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installing:

Windows: Unzip the exe file and run the game. If it says windows protected your pc, dont worry, thats because the game isnt commonly downloaded. its not malware. click "more info > run anyway"

Linux: U- ...you know what I trust you all
